name: BFK WARZONE
description: $BFK is presenting a simple yet specialized gaming ecosystem in which our native token will be used as the currency for our P2E shooter and our NFT Marketplace. We are designing an interactive marketplace where our NFTs will feature as in-game playable characters that can be used to earn tokens in multiple game modes. Challenge your gaming buddies to 1v1, or join forces to take down bosses in dungeon style gameplay!
